root.name: Royal Revolt
root.description: OverviewRoyal Revolt! is a reverse tower defense game developed and published by flaregames for the Android, iPhone, and iPad platforms.GameplayRoyal Revolt! is a tower defense game in which the player is the attacking force rather than the defending one. There are 30 levels, each of which the goal is to take over the castle at the end.Royal Revolt! also includes in-app purchases for various power ups that can be used during a level, but these are not required in order to finish the game.
